tooltips: How far and by what methods passengers travel in the UK
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person is 10% further than in 2015. 81% of this is done by car.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person is 2% less than in 2015. 72.5% of this is done by car.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person is 9% less than in 2015. 63% of this is done by car.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person is 24% less than in 2015. 48.5% of this is done by car.
Distance flown abroad by passengers from the UK
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person internationally is 41% further than in 2015.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person internationally is 27% further than in 2015.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person internationally is 12% further than in 2015.
By 2050 the average annual distance travelled per person internationally is 3% less than in 2015.
